EnhanceR Symposium 2023

Research Software Engineering

  • Home
  • Timetable
  • Registration
  • Materials
  • EnhanceR Seminar

EnhanceR Symposium 2023 will take place in Bern on Wednesday, October 18, 2023.

If you are registered, you will receive all news about the schedule by email.

Overview schedule
9:30–10:00 Registration / Coffee
10:00–10:15 Welcome
10:15–11:00 Keynote: The growth of Research Software Engineering and its vital place in research (Simon Hettrick)
11:00–11:30 Plenary: SWITCH Cloud – The cloud for education and research (Visho Jesudasan)
11:30–12:00 Plenary: Collaborative expertise: synergies between multi-disciplinary experts and end users in software development (Aaron Ponti)
12:00–13:00 Show-and-tell parallel sessions 1–2 (see below)
13:00–14:00 Lunch (restaurant Grosse Schanze)
14:00–14:30 Plenary: Streamlining Research Data Storage: A user-centric approach (Julia Gustavsen)
14:30–15:00 EnhanceR Seminar announcement + community needs discussion
15:00–17:00 Show-and-tell parallel sessions 3–6 (see below)
17:00–17:10 Farewell
Full schedule
